title: lina2018
author: lina2018
created_time: September 20, 2023, 03:36:13 AMLast edit: October 04, 2023, 05:05:35 AM by lina2018
content: ANN THREADInfo About the Project: Crypto Angels Surprise Will Allocates $1M in Randomly select for 1000 Crypto Community Members, In a world where wealth often accumulates in the hands of a few, we are excited to present a unique opportunity that embodies the principles of empathy, selflessness, and love for humanity. Today, we introduce you to a visionary billionaire who admired the concept of blockchain and, before his passing, decided to share his wealth with the crypto community. This is your chance to be a part of something extraordinary.Our benefactor, whose identity remains anonymous, believed in the power of crypto to bring people together. He was inspired by the examples set by individuals like Bill Gates, Warren Buffett, and others who devoted their wealth to charitable causes. This visionary decided to allocate a significant portion of his fortune to benefit the crypto community and advance the principles of decentralization, unity, and love.4th Quarter 2023: Random Allocation of $1 Million to 1000 Crypto Community Members1000 lucky members of the crypto community will receive an unexpected gift. Our benefactor's wealth will be randomly allocated to individuals, further decentralizing wealth within the crypto space.4th Quarter 2023: Launch of Free NFTs Unveiling the Benefactor's CharacterWe are thrilled to announce the launch of free NFTs that will unveil the character and spirit of our generous benefactor. These NFTs will be minted by community members, highlighting the collaborative nature of this initiative.Campaign Period:Week 1 ¬† : 20/09/23 - 26/09/23Week 2 ¬† : 27/09/23 - 03/10/23Week 3 ¬† : 04/10/23 - 10/10/23Bounty General Rules:1. All Bounty participants must be from South Korea, Japan, Australia and European countries2. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.3. Youtube Video submission form will be closed 3 days before the end of the bounty.4. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.5. All reports will be sent using the google report submission form. For videos please use the registration form.Reports made on the thread will not be calculatedProof Of Registration Format(All participants must send 1 time):#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:Country:USDT(TRC20) wallet address:Bounty Allocation Twitter ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†(40%) Video ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†(60%)Twitter Campaign: Rules:1. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 100 followers2. Participants have to make minimumm 5 new tweets per week.3. Time gap between 2 tweets needs to be 24 hours minimum4. Participants must use #CryptoAngels #reward ##CharityInCrypto #NFT and use this link- https://omniform1.com/forms/v1/landingPage/64b5b74a7947c2badc337480/64b723794bfc9bb04d76fbc5Rewards:1. Have more than 100 followers: 1 stake/week 2. Have more than 500 followers: 2 stakes/week 3. Have more than 1000 followers: 3 stakes/week 4. Have more than 5000 followers: 4 stakes/weekHow to join: Have to fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/AsWbaDBpKFN1X9TM9 Youtube Campaign: Rules: 1. Participants must have at least 100+ youtube subscribers. Videos need to be a minimum of 3 minutes in length. 2. Each participant can send 1 video only. 3. Video Content must focus on a relevant topic: project introduction, Why should everyone participate, Project Roadmap, Show how to submit the form,etc.4. Only original video content will be accepted. 5. Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered. 6. Bot voices will not be rewarded. But, a good quality animation video with bot voices will be rewarded. 7. Bad quality video will not be rewarded. USDT will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality. 8. Videos should never be removed, Removal/deletion will result in disqualification. 9. All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication 10. In the video description must have this link- https://omniform1.com/forms/v1/landingPage/64b5b74a7947c2badc337480/64b723794bfc9bb04d76fbc5 and link must be clickable. Please verify your channel to get clickable links.Otherwise you will not get any rewards.Rewards: Excellent Quality: 50$ USDT (video>5000 views) Best Quality: 25$ USDT (video>2000 views) Good quality: 20$ USDT Average quality: 10$ USDTPoor quality: 1$ USDT How to join:Have to fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/5Los5xnot1668Q8Y6 Update- Bounty Campaign Spreadsheet https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1LHOm-I4Bygv2MQsc-9CdXOL06P4cGfci447jQcSuMzoUpdate- The team has decided to close the bounty campaign due to low submissions of participants and fewer participants from countries that require. All Bounty related updates will be found in this group- https://t.me/lcampaigns2023 Disclaimer:[N.B- USDT distribution will be done by the team after completing the bounty campaign. I am the only bounty manager of this project. I am not responsible for any bad things about this project. I have the right to change any rules of this bounty project.]
